医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
专家确定了阿尔茨海默病认知抵抗力和恢复力方面的性别差异研究人员调查了阿尔茨海默病中与性别相关和性别特异性的抵抗力和恢复力因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Experts-identify-sex-and-gender-differences-in-cognitive-resistance-and-resilience-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Experts-identify-sex-and-gender-differences-in-cognitive-resistance-and-resilience-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2619e61c-cf66-4575-9ab3-4655c43bbba9 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 06:00:00 -0400 Experts identify sex and gender differences in cognitive resistance and resilience to Alzheimer's disease
新研究强调睡眠障碍对 COVID-19 和长期 COVID 的影响先前存在的睡眠障碍对 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的易感性、严重程度和长期影响的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-study-highlights-impact-of-sleep-disturbances-on-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/New-study-highlights-impact-of-sleep-disturbances-on-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38992d66-5b8d-4f88-a969-4272ef2d656e Wed, 10 Jul 2024 05:34:00 -0400 New study highlights impact of sleep disturbances on COVID-19 and long COVID
科学家们发现了 5,000 多种基因变异，这些变异使某些癌症得以肆虐研究人员对 BAP1 进行了饱和基因组编辑，其功能障碍与癌症和神经发育受损有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Scientists-identify-over-5000-genic-variants-that-enable-certain-cancers-to-thrive.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Scientists-identify-over-5000-genic-variants-that-enable-certain-cancers-to-thrive.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f701adf-0595-44d4-a41e-2c7ea3ed53d9 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 05:31:00 -0400 Scientists identify over 5,000 genetic variants that enable certain cancers to thrive
研究人员呼吁对人工智能在医疗保健中的使用提供道德指导通过系统审查在医疗保健中部署大型语言模型 (LLM) 的伦理影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Researchers-call-for-ethical-guidance-on-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Researchers-call-for-ethical-guidance-on-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f35863ec-84d1-4c32-a0d6-bc39d40501fa Wed, 10 Jul 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Researchers call for ethical guidance on use of AI in healthcare
KNAUER 最畅销的 HPLC 系统现已获得 ACT Ecolabel 认证My Green Lab 现已评估 KNAUER 最畅销的 HPLC 系统的环境影响，并授予其 ACT 生态标签。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/KNAUERe28099s-top-畅销-HPLC-systems-now-ACT-Ecolabel-certified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/KNAUERe28099s-top-畅销-HPLC-systems-now-ACT-Ecolabel-certified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c4e3747-0fd9-442a-bf1f-92d588391a34 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 05:02:00 -0400 KNAUER’s top-selling HPLC systems now ACT Ecolabel certified
替泽帕肽在超重和肥胖成人减肥方面优于索马鲁肽对于超重或肥胖的成人，替泽帕肽比索马鲁肽能显着减轻体重，而胃肠道不良反应没有显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Tirzepatide-outperforms-semaglutide-in-weight-loss-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Tirzepatide-outperforms-semaglutide-in-weight-loss-for-overweight-and-obese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15492b9f-cdd1-4bfa-8131-0d5c51d2e7e3 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:38:00 -0400 Tirzepatide outperforms semaglutide in weight loss for overweight and obese adults
60 年的历程：纳米粒子彻底改变了核苷酸输送研究人员追踪了用于核酸递送的脂质纳米颗粒 (LNP) 60 年的演变，强调了它们通过更安全、更有效的治疗彻底改变基因治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/60-years-in-the-making-Nanoarticles-revolutionize-核苷酸-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/60-years-in-the-making-Nanoarticles-revolutionize-核苷酸-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=791952e1-5a56-4bc3-b46a-0ad3ebce8​​957 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:10:00 -0400 60 years in the making: Nanoparticles revolutionize nucleotide delivery
世界上第一张人脑脂质图被绘制出来科学家发现，脑组织中93%的脂质在白质和灰质、皮层下、视觉和运动皮层以及负责决策、社会行为和其他功能的前额叶皮层中分布不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Worlde28099s-first-map-of- human-brain-lipids-created.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Worlde28099s-first-map-of- human-brain-lipids-created.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c7a74e-fac9-4667-81fe-4d04e8dd2c09 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:08:00 -0400 World’s first map of human brain lipids created
新型设备使用简单的血液测试来检测早期肺癌昆士兰大学的研究人员设计了一种设备，可以通过简单的血液测试来检测早期肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-device-uses-a-simple-blood-test-to-detect-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Novel-device-uses-a-simple-blood-test-to-detect-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b41e786-08b1-4b5e-92a5-e39ecc2073e0 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 02:02:00 -0400 Novel device uses a simple blood test to detect early stage lung cancer
酶的突破可能会彻底改变绿色癌症治疗的生产曼彻斯特大学的科学家发现了一种更有效、更可持续的方法来制造肽类药物，在对抗癌症方面显示出良好的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Enzyme-breakthrough-could-revolutionize-the-production-of-greener-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240710/Enzyme-breakthrough-could-revolutionize-the-product-of-greener-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb86233-4bb3-41a3-83d3-ff45c83aa4b5 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 01:57:00 -0400 Enzyme breakthrough could revolutionize the production of greener cancer treatments
